diff_hunk:
@@ -6839,6 +6876,9 @@ def clone_inputs(requires_grad):
     outputs_test = func(*nograd_inputs, **kwargs)
     self.assertEqual(outputs, outputs_test)
 
+    graph, graph_inputs = func_graph_inputs(*nograd_inputs, **kwargs)
+    self.assertExportImport(graph, graph_inputs)
body: I though there was some value in separating out the export / import tests from the creation of traced_fn/script_fn. You're right that the code is much simpler. I have updated to the way you suggested.
